snippet: The killing of a Taiwanese fisherman by the crew of a Philippine Coast Guard vessel has strained relations between the two countries.
abstract: Investigators in the Philippines are recommending that criminal charges be filed against  crew of Philippine Coast Guard vessel that opened fire on Taiwanese boat in May, killing one fisherman.
lead_paragraph: The killing of a Taiwanese fisherman by the crew of a Philippine Coast Guard vessel has strained relations between the two countries.

headline.main: Charges Urged in Filipino Raid on Taiwanese Boat
headline.print_headline: Philippines: Charges Recommended In Shooting of Taiwanese Fisherman
